subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: After Andrew Luck and Robert Griffin III were selected with the top two picks, a flurry of first-round trades, a record 19, provided the excitement in the N.F.L. draft.
snippet: After Andrew Luck and Robert Griffin III were selected with the top two picks, a flurry of first-round trades, a record 19, provided the excitement in the N.F.L. draft.
